name: WaveLand
description: Enter a world of speed, inspired by platform fighters. Explore the hub and wavedash your way to the top of the leaderboards! New Dark Levels!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.2Ghz Dual Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboards that are unable to register 4 key presses at a time will not be able to play WaveLand in the intended way.
